item.title: Bernie Sanders, Millennials, and Why They Are Wrong...About Everything
item.description: Some of you are going to love this post. Most of you will hate it. My job is to ell the truth. Sometimes the truth hurts, and some of you can't handle the truth. However, the truth shall set you free. I'm out of clichés. Bernie Sanders is an admitted “democratic socialist”. There used to be a time not that long ago where socialism was proven to be a very bad thing in America and one step away from communism.
